mapper.insert: INSERT INTO af_user_amount(biz_order_no , biz_type , user_id , source_id , gmt_create , gmt_modified , remark , amount,status) VALUES ( #{bizOrderNo}, #{bizType}, #{userId}, #{sourceId}, NOW(), NOW(), #{remark}, #{amount}, #{status} )
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE (SUM(amount), 0) from af_user_amount_detail where user_amount_id = #{amountId}

SELECT d.id rid, c.sale_amount saleAmount, c.bank_amount bankAmount, d.nper nper, d.nper_amount nperAmount, d.nper_repayment nperRepayment, d.NAME name from af_user_amount a LEFT JOIN af_order_refund b on a.source_id = b.id LEFT JOIN af_order c on c.id = b.order_id LEFT JOIN af_borrow d on d.order_id = b.order_id WHERE a.id = #{amountId} and b.is_delete = 0 and d.is_delete = 0 order by c.gmt_create limit 0,1
SELECT COALESCE (SUM(amount), 0) from af_user_amount_detail where user_amount_id = #{amountId} and type in (3,4,5)
